Workshop 7

Epigraphy.info Workshop VII Leuven (in person)

The seventh epigraphy.info workshop in Leuven will be taking place in the late autumn 2022. More information about the venue, the registration and the programme will be available here before the summer 2022.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Epigraphy.info committee (info@epigraphy.info).

Subscribe via RSS

Epigraphy.info is an international open community pursuing a collaborative environment for digital epigraphy, which facilitates scholarly communication and interaction.
